timeline.message: GEOT-6608 Fix user-agent for OSM tiles

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
headers.put("User-Agent", "Geotools Http client");
headers.put("User-Agent", "Geotools HTTP client");

:-p
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.body: Wondering if SimpleHttpClient should default to the new user agent. It's not the first time I see cascading blocked because servers don't like the Java user agent.
